text: Beauty is the bait which with delight allures man to enlarge his kind.
author: Socrates

text: Loneliness adds beauty to life. It puts a special burn on sunsets and makes night air smell better.
author: Henry Rollins

text: The perception of beauty is a moral test.
author: Henry David Thoreau

text: For every moment of triumph, for every instance of beauty, many souls must be trampled.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

text: Alas! how little does the memory of these human inhabitants enhance the beauty of the landscape!
author: Henry David Thoreau
